name: Zone 2 into Threshold
description:
After a good warmup complete 2 x 5min Threshold efforts. However, the threshold effort ramps up from low to high threshold over the 5min. Recovery time is 1min @ 65% FTP. This is the level at which lactate is cleared at it's highest rate.
